hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“When the end of time draws near, hardly any believer will see a false dream, and the ones who see the truest dreams will be the ones who are truest in speech. And the dream of the believer is one of the forty-six parts of prophecy.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب أَصْدَقُ النَّاسِ رُؤْيَا أَصْدَقُهُمْ حَدِيثًا
chapter.eng-name: The People who see the Truest Dreams are those who are truest in speech
